title: Can anyone tell me where to find my emotes?
body: Idk if this is the right board or not, but I can't find them anywhere, can someone tell me where they are? ty.

replies.body: Emotes are currently disabled on NA while our devs look into an issue, per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Once enabled, you should see a section for it in your Collections.  Hang tight!
